sqlMap.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN C.COL_SEQ IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE 'I' END AS STATUS, A.INF_ID, A.INF_SEQ, B.COL_SEQ,
DECODE(C.V_ORDER, 0, B.V_ORDER, C.V_ORDER) AS V_ORDER, B.COL_ID, B.COL_NM, NVL(C.VIEW_CD,'Text') AS VIEW_CD, C.ALIGN_TAG, NVL(C.VIEW_SIZE,100) AS VIEW_SIZE, C.SORT_TAG, NVL(C.VIEW_YN,'N') AS VIEW_YN, NVL(C.USE_YN,'Y') AS USE_YN, NVL(C.DOWN_YN,'N') AS DOWN_YN, DECODE(C.FILT_YN, 'Y', '사용중', '') AS SOPT_SET FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD =#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL A USING( SELECT #infId:VARCHAR# AS INF_ID ,#infSeq:NUMERIC# AS INF_SEQ ,#colSeq:NUMERIC# AS COL_SEQ ,#vOrder:NUMERIC# AS V_ORDER ,#viewCd:VARCHAR# AS VIEW_CD ,#alignTag:CHAR# AS ALIGN_TAG ,#viewSize:NUMERIC# AS VIEW_SIZE ,#sortTag:CHAR# AS SORT_TAG ,#viewYn:CHAR# AS VIEW_YN ,#useYn:CHAR# AS USE_YN ,#sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# AS REG_ID ,SYSDATE AS REG_DTTM ,#sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# AS UPD_ID ,SYSDATE AS UPD_DTTM ,#downYn:CHAR# AS DOWN_YN FROM DUAL )B ON ( A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = B.INF_SEQ AND A.COL_SEQ =B.COL_SEQ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.V_ORDER = B.V_ORDER ,A.VIEW_CD = B.VIEW_CD ,A.ALIGN_TAG = B.ALIGN_TAG ,A.VIEW_SIZE = B.VIEW_SIZE ,A.SORT_TAG = B.SORT_TAG ,A.VIEW_YN = B.VIEW_YN ,A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN ,A.UPD_ID = B.UPD_ID ,A.UPD_DTTM = B.UPD_DTTM ,A.DOWN_YN = B.DOWN_YN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.INF_ID ,A.INF_SEQ ,A.COL_SEQ ,A.V_ORDER ,A.VIEW_CD ,A.ALIGN_TAG ,A.VIEW_SIZE ,A.SORT_TAG ,A.VIEW_YN ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_ID ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.UPD_ID ,A.UPD_DTTM ,A.DOWN_YN )VALUES ( B.INF_ID ,B.INF_SEQ ,B.COL_SEQ ,B.V_ORDER ,B.VIEW_CD ,B.ALIGN_TAG ,B.VIEW_SIZE ,B.SORT_TAG ,B.VIEW_YN ,B.USE_YN ,B.REG_ID ,B.REG_DTTM ,B.UPD_ID ,B.UPD_DTTM ,B.DOWN_YN )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.INF_ID ,A.INF_SEQ ,A.INF_NM ,A.SRV_CD ,A.OWNER_CD ,A.DS_ID ,A.DS_NM ,B.COL_ID ,B.SRC_COL_ID ,B.COL_NM ,B.COL_SEQ ,COND_YN ,COND_OP ,COND_VAR ,FILT_YN ,FILT_CD ,FILT_MAX_DAY ,FILT_TBL_CD ,FILT_CODE ,FILT_DEFAULT ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'CHECK' THEN FILT_DEFAULT WHEN 'COMBO' THEN FILT_DEFAULT WHEN 'RADIO' THEN FILT_DEFAULT ELSE '' END FILT_DEFAULT1 ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'POPUP' THEN FILT_DEFAULT ELSE '' END FILT_DEFAULT2 ,FILT_NEED ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'CHECK' THEN FILT_NEED WHEN 'COMBO' THEN FILT_NEED WHEN 'RADIO' THEN FILT_NEED ELSE 'N' END FILT_NEED1 ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'POPUP' THEN FILT_NEED ELSE 'N' END FILT_NEED2 FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE C.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND C.INF_SEQ=#infSeq:NUMERIC# AND C.COL_SEQ=#colSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL SET COND_YN = #condYn:CHAR# ,COND_OP = #condOp:VARCHAR# ,COND_VAR = #condVar:VARCHAR# ,FILT_YN = #filtYn:CHAR# ,FILT_CD = #filtCd:VARCHAR# ,FILT_MAX_DAY = NVL(#filtMaxDay:NUMERIC#,1) ,FILT_TBL_CD = #filtTblCd:VARCHAR# ,FILT_CODE = #filtCode:VARCHAR# ,FILT_DEFAULT = #filtDefault:VARCHAR# ,FILT_DEFAULT_NM = #filtDefaultNm:VARCHAR# ,FILT_NEED = NVL(#filtNeed:CHAR#,'N') ,UPD_ID = #sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# ,UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND INF_SEQ=#infSeq:NUMERIC# AND COL_SEQ=#colSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
B.COL_NM||FN_GET_COMM_CODE_NM('D1013',UNIT_CD) AS COL_NM
B.ENG_COL_NM||FN_GET_COMM_CODE_ENM('D1013',UNIT_CD) AS COL_NM
,B.SRC_COL_ID ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD ='Float' THEN 'Float' ELSE C.VIEW_CD END AS VIEW_CD ,C.SORT_TAG ,CASE WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='C' THEN 'Center' WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='R' THEN 'Right' WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='L' THEN 'Left' END AS ALIGN_TAG ,NVL(C.VIEW_SIZE,100) AS VIEW_SIZE ,A.INF_SEQ ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD = 'Float' THEN '##,####0.####' ELSE '' END AS FORMAT_TEXT ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD = 'Text' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ELLIPSIS_TEXT ,1 AS ALLOW_NULL FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.VIEW_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y'
AND B.SRC_COL_ID = #gridItem#
ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.VIEW_CD ,NVL(C.VIEW_SIZE,100) AS VIEW_SIZE ,B.ALIGN_TAG FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.VIEW_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT 'RN' AS R_Save_Name ,'Seq' AS R_Type ,'Center' AS R_Align ,50 AS R_Width ,'false' AS R_Edit ,'' AS R_Format ,0 AS R_Ellipsis ,0 AS R_Sort ,1 AS R_Allow_Null FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID AS R_Save_Name ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD ='Float' THEN 'Float' ELSE C.VIEW_CD END AS R_Type ,CASE WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='C' THEN 'Center' WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='R' THEN 'Right' WHEN C.ALIGN_TAG ='L' THEN 'Left' END AS R_Align ,NVL(C.VIEW_SIZE,100) AS R_Width ,'false' AS R_Edit ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD = 'Float' THEN '##,####0.####' ELSE '' END AS R_Format ,CASE WHEN C.VIEW_CD = 'Text' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS R_Ellipsis ,1 AS R_Sort ,1 AS R_Allow_Null FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.VIEW_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y'
AND B.SRC_COL_ID = #gridItem#
ORDER BY C.V_ORDER )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT
B.COL_NM
B.ENG_COL_NM AS COL_NM
,B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.FILT_YN ,C.FILT_CD ,C.FILT_MAX_DAY ,C.FILT_TBL_CD ,C.FILT_CODE ,C.FILT_NEED ,C.FILT_DEFAULT ,C.V_ORDER ,C.FILT_DEFAULT_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_CD IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') AND C.FILT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' UNION ALL SELECT
B.COL_NM
B.ENG_COL_NM AS COL_NM
,B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.FILT_YN ,C.FILT_CD ,C.FILT_MAX_DAY ,C.FILT_TBL_CD ,C.FILT_CODE ,C.FILT_NEED ,C.FILT_DEFAULT ,C.V_ORDER ,C.FILT_DEFAULT_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' AND C.FILT_CD NOT IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') )ORDER BY V_ORDER

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,B.COL_NM ,D.DITC_CD
,D.DITC_NM
,D.ENG_DITC_NM AS DITC_NM
,decode(C.COND_YN, 'Y', FN_COND_VAR_LIMIT(B.SRC_COL_ID, D.DITC_CD, C.COND_OP, C.COND_VAR), 'Y') as VIEW_YN FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ INNER JOIN TV_DATA_CODE D ON C.FILT_CODE =D.GRP_CD WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' AND C.FILT_CD IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') ORDER BY D.V_ORDER ) WHERE VIEW_YN='Y'

SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.COND_OP ,C.COND_VAR FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.COND_YN='Y' AND C.USE_YN ='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.SORT_TAG FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_SCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN ='Y' AND SORT_TAG IS NOT NULL AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

select.isNotEqual: SELECT $selectQuery$ ,WISEOPEN_CNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT $selectQuery$ ,COUNT(*) OVER() WISEOPEN_CNT FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $pubDttmQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$ )TB ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #startPage:NUMERIC# AND #endPage:NUMERIC#

sqlMap.select: SELECT $selectQuery$ FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $pubDttmQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$

SELECT 'SELECT '|| COL_ID||' AS COL_ID,'||COL_NM||' AS COL_NM FROM ' ||TBL_ID ||' WHERE 1=1 '|| CASE WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) = '' THEN '' WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'AND '||COND_WHERE END
|| ' AND (UPPER(' || COL_ID || ') LIKE ''%'||#popupSerach#||'%'' OR UPPER( '|| COL_NM||') LIKE ''%' || #popupSerach# || '%'')'
AS queryString FROM TV_POPUP_CODE WHERE TBL_ID = #tblId:VARCHAR#
SELECT CASE WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) = '' THEN '' WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'AND '||COND_WHERE END AS connWhere FROM TV_POPUP_CODE WHERE TBL_ID = #tblId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( $queryString$ )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM( $queryString$ )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT OFFC_CD AS COL_ID
,OFFC_NM AS COL_NM
,OFFC_ENG_NM AS COL_NM
FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
$connWhere$
AND (OFFC_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or OFFC_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
AND (OFFC_ENG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or OFFC_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
)TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
$connWhere$
AND (OFFC_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or OFFC_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
AND (OFFC_ENG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or OFFC_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT FGO_CD AS COL_ID
,FGO_NM AS COL_NM
,FGO_ENG_NM AS COL_NM
FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND GOF_DIV_CD = #gofDivCd:VARCHAR# AND OFFC_CD =#offcCd:VARCHAR# AND FSCL_CD =#fsclCd:VARCHAR# AND ACCT_CD =#acctCd:VARCHAR#
$connWhere$
AND (FGO_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or FGO_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
AND (FGO_ENG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or FGO_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
)TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND GOF_DIV_CD = #gofDivCd:VARCHAR# AND OFFC_CD =#offcCd:VARCHAR# AND FSCL_CD =#fsclCd:VARCHAR# AND ACCT_CD =#acctCd:VARCHAR#
$connWhere$
AND (FGO_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or FGO_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT FSCL_CD AS COL_ID
,FSCL_NM AS COL_NM
,FSCL_ENG_NM AS COL_NM
FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND OFFC_CD = #offcCd:VARCHAR#
$connWhere$
AND (FSCL_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or FSCL_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
AND (FSCL_ENG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or FSCL_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
)TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

)TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

,IHANG_NM AS COL_NM
,IHANG_ENG_NM AS COL_NM
FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND IKWAN_CD =#ikwanCd:VARCHAR#

AND (IHANG_ENG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%' or IHANG_CD LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%')
)TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#
